Class Equipa

  • java.lang.Object
    • jogosolimpicos.Equipa
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Equipa
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Main class of the teams of athletes for the team competitions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
